entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
